divs: Sighting DetailsWas driving west on bonds ranch rd fort worth Texas around 7:30 when I noticed 5 lighted circular objects in sky said to my son do you see that? he said yes you are not crazy! They appeared to be circular with lights of yellow to red and was spinning there was no sound 3 of them disappeared suddenly We then noticed people pulled over to witness event. When we got to our gate there were people pulled over we asked what they thought the guy said that's a UFO man we just witnessed a UFO at that time a guy was at the gate across from mine he said did you guys see that? The sighting lasted only 5 minutes or so but was witnessed by quite a few people.
Summary: 5 hovering lights no sound weNt from 5 to 2 then 1 and then they were gone several people saw it and pulled over to watch event
trends: There have been 128 other sightings in Fort Worth
There were no other sightings in Fort Worth on or around March 1st 2013
